remarks: The base set of an image structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
qusaddf.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( R /s .~ ) ) $.
qusaddf.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
qusaddf.r $e |- ( ph -> .~ Er V ) $.
qusaddf.z $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
qusaddf.e $e |- ( ph -> ( ( a .~ p /\ b .~ q ) -> ( a .x. b ) .~ ( p .x. q ) ) ) $.
qusaddf.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( p e. V /\ q e. V ) ) -> ( p .x. q ) e. V ) $.
qusaddf.p $e |- .x. = ( +g ` R ) $.
qusaddf.a $e |- .xb = ( +g ` U ) $.
qusaddval $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( [ X ] .~ .xb [ Y ] .~ ) = [ ( X .x. Y ) ] .~ ) $.
$d .x. p q $.
$d .xb a b p q $.
$d .~ a b p q $.
$d R p q $.
$d V a b p q $.
$d X p q $.
$d Y p q $.
$d a b p ph q $.
